tables.name: division
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE division (
    id       INTEGER      NOT NULL
                          PRIMARY KEY,
    division VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL
)

tables.name: node

constraints.name: - (Foreign key ID: 0)
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY (division_id) REFERENCES division (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE

tables.def:
CREATE TABLE node (
    tax_id        INTEGER      NOT NULL
                               PRIMARY KEY,
    parent_tax_id INTEGER,
    rank          VARCHAR (25) NOT NULL,
    division_id   INTEGER      NOT NULL,
    comment       TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (
        division_id
    )
    REFERENCES division (id)
)

tables.name: name
tables.def:
CREATE TABLE name (
    id         INTEGER      NOT NULL
                            PRIMARY KEY,
    tax_id     INTEGER      NOT NULL,
    name       VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL,
    name_class VARCHAR (50) NOT NULL
)

relations.def: FOREIGN KEY (division_id) REFERENCES division (id) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION MATCH NONE
